reference.shortdesc: Simple tables are a basic tabular environment to present organized content.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Choose the simpletable element when control of tabular formatting is not as important. simpletable is designed for closer compatibility with HTML5 tables. For example, multi-column tabular data such as phone directory listings or parts lists are good candidates for simpletable. Another good use of simpletable is for information that seems to beg for a three-part definition list; the keycol attribute can be used to indicate which column represents the "key" or term-like column of the structure.

section.p: The keycol attribute indicates which column represents the "key" or term-like column of the structure.

The close match of simpletable to tabular, regular data makes simpletable suitable as the basis for specialized structures such as properties (for programming information) and choice tables (for tasks).
